full_summary:
# Environmental Chamber

## Tender Details

*   **Reference Number:** PW-__PV-867-81350
*   **Amendment Number:** 1
*   **Solicitation Number:** U6309-221902/B
*   **Publication Date:** August 18, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date:** September 9, 2022 at 14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:** August 30, 2022

## Contract Details

*   **Contract Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements:** Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contract Requirements

*   **Delivery Location:** Ontario (except NCR)
*   **Delivery Deadline:** December 16, 2022
*   **Contract Period:** One year after delivery and acceptance

## Tender Description

Measurement Canada (MC) requires the supply of one environmental chamber. Bidders must meet the mandatory requirements detailed in the Request for Proposal. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

## Notice Information

*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
*   **Notice URL:** None
*   **Attachments:**
    *   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/29/0f498b3637c833d50ef04c48b37b0ab0/ABES.PROD.PW__PV.B867.E81350.EBSU001.PDF
    *   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/17/8e646a8cca05627a876f7482a6ebd844/ABES.PROD.PW__PV.B867.E81350.EBSU000.PDF
